title: Bosley Revive Shampoo & Conditioner For Visibly Thinning Color Treated Hair Liter Duo (33.8 oz)
description: *A gentle rejuvenating, sulfate free cleanser that removes toxins such as D.H.T. (a primary cause of hair loss) from the scalp of visibly thinning hair. *What it does: Reconditions the hair while rejuvenating the scalp with LifeXtend Complex Plus. *How to use it: Apply daily to wet hair, massage., leave one minute and rinse. Paraben free Volumizing conditioner. *What it does: Infuses hair with vitality, volume while it smoothes and adds shine and a thicker appearance to visibly thinning hair. *How to use it: Apply daily to clean wet hair, leave 5 minutes, rinse.

title: Now Foods Organic Argan Oil, 2 Count
description: Condition: For dry hair, scalp, skin and/or cuticles in need of natural and intensive moisture renewal. Solution: Organic Argan Oil from Morocco is beneficial for all skin types due to its rich fatty acid content. Organic Argan Oil is a multi-functional product. It adds shine to your hair and provides moisture for your skin, hair, scalp and nail cuticles. It also helps to soothe damaged and irritated skin. Because it's easily-absorbed, Organic Argan Oil helps to maintain a healthy skin pH balance as well.

title: Now Foods Essential Oil, Lemon, 4 Fluid Ounce
description: Lemons were mentioned in ancient Sanskrit texts as early as 800 BC, and famed explorers like Columbus and Vasco DeGama carried lemons and other citrus fruits with them during their arduous sea voyages. NOW® Lemon Oil is naturally cold-pressed from fresh lemon peels. This essential oil is 100% pure

title: Anti-Cellulite Cream in the Sponge with Seaweed Extract and Caffeine. Cellulite Reduction and Skin Firming. Best Cellulite Treatment Super Effective Formula. (Vanilla Orchid Black Tea)
description: Fast and convenient cellulite smoothing every time you shower.Exclusively formulated with new SalSphere Muscle Toner, clinically shown to help fight cellulite.Seaweed extract enhances microcirculation to help prevent dimpling of fatty areas.Specially textured pad enhances the delivery of anti-cellulite ingredients.Luxurious, moisturizing body wash leaves the skin soft and supple.Unique surface exfoliates rough, dry skin, polishing from neck to toe.Refreshing aromatherapy fragrance.
